title: Хрупкие убийцы
overview: Psychologists distinguish six types of female killers: the avenger, the angel of death, the bloody lady, Snow White's stepmother, the black widow and the mercenary killer. Journalist Oksana Shcherbakova will visit women's prisons, show their daily life and tell about several criminal types using real convicted women as examples, including the most brutal serial killer in Russia.
